2nd worst flood after 1924 | 10 out of the 14 districts severely affected | 15 bridges collapsed | 27 dams opened | 186 lives lost | 211 landslides | 20000 houses damaged | 10000 km of roads destroyed | Preliminary estimates count a loss of â‚¹8316 Crore |
Heavy rains on June 16 caused flash flooding and several rivers to rise to major flood stage. Numerous roads and bridges were damaged or destroyed. https://t.co/4ob52Sl4OL
